text: The 2022 Oder environmental disaster occurred in August. Many fish, beavers and other wildlife in the Oder river in Poland and Germany died. This caused a health and environmental crisis. On 11 August 2022, it was discovered that some parts of the Oder river were contaminated and many dead fish were seen on shore. The discovery was made by local fishermen. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Europe Category:2022 in Germany Category:2020s disasters in Germany Category:2020s in Poland Category:August 2022 events
title: 2022 Oder environmental disaster
